text.section: The Comptroller shall enforce this title.

section.section:
The Comptroller:
shall appoint a chief license inspector; and
may appoint assistant license inspectors.

The chief license inspector and each assistant license inspector is entitled to:
compensation in accordance with the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

text.section: The Comptroller may delegate any power or duty of the Comptroller under this title.

The Comptroller may adopt regulations to:
carry out this title; and
define any term used in this title.
